title: Metal dragons/Strategies

properties.name: description
properties.value: Bronze, Iron and Steel Metal dragons can be killed with all three combat styles. However, players who do not have any dragonbane weapons are highly recommended to use the Magic setup.

content:
For a guide on killing Mithril dragons, see Mithril dragon/Strategies.

Bronze, Iron and Steel Metal dragons can be killed with all three combat styles. However, players who do not have any dragonbane weapons are highly recommended to use the Magic setup.

Suggested skills[edit | edit source]

  • 70+
  • 70+
  • 70+
  • 70+
  • 75+
  • 70+
  • 44+ (Eagle Eye, 45+ Mystic Might, 70+ Piety, 74+ Rigour, 77+ Augury)

Equipment[edit | edit source]

Melee is an efficient way of killing them, especially with a Dragon hunter lance (the best stab weapon against Dragons and draconic creatures) and using Proselyte armour for Prayer or high-tier armour, such as Bandos or Barrows equipment, for Defence. The Dragon hunter lance is the best choice followed by the Ghrazi rapier, the Zamorakian hasta and lastly followed by Dragon sword. Using slash weapons, such as an Abyssal whip, is not recommended due to their high slash defences. As their Defence is extremely high, the higher the stab bonus the faster the kills will be, thus using fewer supplies.

Recommended equipment for Melee
SlotItem (most effective → least effective)
Slayer helmet[1]Torva full helmNeitiznot faceguardHelm of neitiznotBerserker helm
Amulet of tortureAmulet of furyAmulet of gloryAmulet of powerN/A
Infernal capeFire capeArdougne cloak 4 Cape of AccomplishmentObsidian cape
Torva platebodyBandos chestplateFighter torsoProselyte hauberk[2]N/A
Torva platelegsBandos tassetsProselyte cuisse[2]N/AN/A
Dragon hunter lanceGhrazi rapierZamorakian hastaAbyssal dagger (p++)Dragon sword
Dragonfire shieldAnti-dragon shieldAvernic defender[3]N/AN/A
Rada's blessing 4God blessing / Rada's blessing 3/2N/AN/AN/A
Ferocious glovesBarrows glovesN/AN/AN/A
Primordial bootsDragon bootsGuardian bootsClimbing bootsN/A
Berserker ring (i)Treasonous ring (i)Berserker ringExplorer's ringN/A
  1. ↑ When assigned as a slayer task
  2. ↑ 2.0 2.1 This may be used over other options to reduce prayer drain
  3. ↑ Requires (extended) super antifire potions

Inventory[edit | edit source]

  • Holy wrench (optional)
  • 2-3 Extended super antifires potions
  • 1-2 Super combat potions
  • 30+ Nature runes and 150+ Fire runes for Alchs (optional)
  • Food is not necessary when fighting bronze, iron or steel dragons with protect from melee.

Ranged can be feasible and very economical if using broad bolts, but using Diamond bolts (e) can be faster at a greater cost. Always keep a distance of several spaces away from the dragon to avoid its melee attack. All you have to do is make sure your antifire is active, and snipe away at a distance.

Recommended equipment for Ranged
SlotItem (most effective → least effective)
Slayer helmet (i)[1]Armadyl helmetKaril's coifArcher helm
Necklace of anguishAmulet of furyAmulet of gloryAmulet of power
Ava's assemblerAva's accumulatorAva's attractorRanging cape
Armadyl chestplateKaril's leathertopBlessed bodyBlack d'hide body
Armadyl chainskirtKaril's leatherskirtBlessed chapsBlack d'hide chaps
Dragon hunter crossbowArmadyl crossbowDragon crossbowRune crossbow
Dragonfire wardAnti-dragon shieldN/AN/A
Diamond dragon bolts (e)Diamond bolts (e)Broad boltsN/A
Zaryte vambracesBarrows glovesBlessed vambracesBlack d'hide vambraces
Pegasian bootsRanger bootsBlessed bootsSnakeskin boots
Archers ring (i)Brimstone ringArchers ringExplorer's ring
  1. ↑ When assigned as a slayer task

Inventory[edit | edit source]

  • 1 Extended antifire
  • 1-2 Prayer potions (optional) Unlike melee, Prayer potions are really not needed when using range unless Eagle Eye or Rigour is used
  • 1-2 Ranging potions
  • 30+ Nature runes and 150+ Fire runes for Alchs (optional)
  • Food is not necessary when fighting bronze, iron or steel dragons from a distance.

Magic is one of the quickest ways to kill metal dragons cheaply, and can be done without taking damage. All the caster has to do is make sure their antifire is active, anti-dragon shield is equipped and attack them at a distance. Although players can opt for better setups if maging, Void mage can be used as well for accounts below 70 Defence. However, Ahrim's will prove to be better when players have level 70 Defence or higher.

Recommended equipment for Magic
SlotItem (most effective → least effective)
Slayer helmet (i)[1]Black mask (i)[1]Ancestral hatAhrim's hoodVoid mage helm

Inventory[edit | edit source]

  • 1 Extended antifire
  • 1-2 Prayer potions (optional) Unlike Melee, Prayer potions are really not needed when using Magic unless Mystic Might or Augury is used
  • 30+ Nature runes and 150+ Fire runes for Alchs (optional)
  • Food is not necessary when fighting bronze, iron or steel dragons from a distance.
